Key Match Events: Jeffery Vandersay took 6 wickets for 33 runs in his first seven overs
Rohit Sharma scored 64 runs off 44 balls, hitting 5 fours and 4 sixes
Shubman Gill was dismissed for 23 runs, edging the leg-spinner to first slip
Virat Kohli was dismissed leg-before for 0 runs
Shreyas Iyer was dismissed lbw for 17 runs
KL Rahul was dismissed for 0 runs, trapping him lbw
Dimuth Wellalage and Kamindu Mendis formed a 72-run partnership for the seventh wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka took an unassailable 1-0 lead in the series
Jeffery Vandersay's performance was praised as a key factor in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Avishka Fernando and Kusal Mendis set a 74-run stand for the second wicket
Washington Sundar removed two set-batters in successive deliveries
Kamindu Mendis scored 40 runs and supported Dimuth Wellalage's late charge
Sri Lanka posted 240 for nine in their innings
